title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Feb 18 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Feb 18 2022
description:
Hannah E. Meyers, director of Policing & Public Safety at the Manhattan Institute, discusses with Clay and Buck the truth about crime and race in New York. Trudeau regime arresting truckers. North Carolina dad goes viral blasting CRT. Ned Ryun, founder and CEO of American Majority and Voter Gravity, on winning the battle to unmask his kids at school in Virginia.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
